column2: "You'll get it for me? Wonderful! You just made my day. I thought I was going to have to get it myself."
"What? Why wouldn't it be a good idea?"
"That's right... Even though I'm an ARKS, I'm just a cook in the galley..."
"But if you'll go do it for me, I could just stay here, safe and sound, and start thinking up some new recipes."
"Oodan meat seems so nice and juicy, I'm sure I could come up with a tasty dish. Don't keep me waiting too long, okay?"
